languages.text: "Это шанс. Нужно действовать". {n}Вот оно. Я чувствую, что добыча рядом. Они почти уже не опасаются выдать себя. Нужна искра, что раздует пламя. Что убедит последователей Немезита, что они сильны. А остальные — ослаблены.{/n}

traits.locale_text:
"Это наш шанс. Нужно действовать, пока есть возможность".
{n}Вот оно. Я уже близко. Чувствую, как добыча бродит кругами. Они где-то рядом. Скрываются в толпе. Все еще опасаются выдать себя. Нужна искра, что раздует пламя толпы. Что убедит последователей Немезита в том, что они — сильны. А остальные ослаблены.{/n}

languages.text: "This is our chance. We need to act." {n}This is it. I can sense that the prey is close. They have little fear of giving themselves away anymore. They need a spark to ignite the flames. Something that will convince Nemesite's followers that they are strong, and that the Domin's servants are diminished.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Это шанс. Нужно действовать". {n}Вот оно. Я чувствую, что добыча рядом. Они почти уже не опасаются выдать себя. Нужна искра, что раздует пламя. Что убедит последователей Немезита, что они сильны. А остальные — ослаблены.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "This is our chance. We need to act." {n}This is it. I can sense that the prey is close. They have little fear of giving themselves away anymore. They need a spark to ignite the flames. Something that will convince the followers of Nemesite that they are strong. And that the rest of us are diminished.{/n}

"This is our chance. We need to act." {n}This is it. I can sense that the prey is close. They have little fear of giving themselves away anymore. They need a spark to ignite the flames. Something that will convince the followers of Nemesite that they are strong. And that the rest of us are diminished.{/n}

Something that will convince the followers of Nemesite that they are strong, and that the rest of us are diminished.{/n}

Something that will convince the followers of Nemesite that they are strong, and that the rest of us are diminished.{/n}

Something that will convince Nemesite's followers that they are strong, and that the Domin's servants are diminished.{/n}

"This is our chance. We need to act." {n}This is it. I can sense that the prey is close. They have little fear of giving themselves away anymore. They need a spark to ignite the flames. Something that will convince Nemesite's followers that they are strong, and that the Domin's servants are diminished.{/n}

languages.text: "Das ist unsere Chance. Wir müssen handeln." {n}Es ist so weit. Ich spüre, dass die Beute nah ist. Sie haben keine Angst mehr, sich zu opfern. Sie brauchen einen Funken, der die Flammen entzündet. Irgendetwas, was Nemesits Anhänger überzeugt, dass sie stark sind, und dass die Diener {rt_mf|des|der} Domin geschwächt sind.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is our chance. We need to act." {n}This is it. I can sense that the prey is close. They have little fear of giving themselves away anymore. They need a spark to ignite the flames. Something that will convince Nemesite's followers that they are strong, and that the Domin's servants are diminished.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das ist unsere Chance. Wir müssen handeln." {n}Es ist so weit. Ich spüre, dass die Beute nah ist. Sie haben keine Angst mehr, sich zu opfern. Sie brauchen einen Funken, der die Flammen entzündet. Irgendetwas, was Nemesits Anhänger überzeugt, dass sie stark sind, und dass die Diener {mf|des|der} Domin geschwächt sind.{/n}

languages.text: «Esta es nuestra oportunidad. Tenemos que actuar». {n}Es el momento. Siento que mi presa está cerca. Ya no tiene miedo de revelarse. Solo necesita una chispa para prender las llamas. Algo que convenza a los seguidores de Nemesitio de que son fuertes, y de que los sirvientes de{rt_mf|l| la} Domin están debilitados.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is our chance. We need to act." {n}This is it. I can sense that the prey is close. They have little fear of giving themselves away anymore. They need a spark to ignite the flames. Something that will convince Nemesite's followers that they are strong, and that the Domin's servants are diminished.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Esta es nuestra oportunidad. Tenemos que actuar». {n}Es el momento. Siento que mi presa está cerca. Ya no tiene miedo de revelarse. Solo necesita una chispa para prender las llamas. Algo que convenza a los seguidores de Nemesitio de que son fuertes, y de que los sirvientes de{mf|l| la} Domin están debilitados.{/n}

languages.text: 「これはチャンスだ。行動に移すぞ」{n}これだ。獲物が近くにいるのを感じる。彼らは自分たちの正体がばれることを、もはや恐れていない。火をつけるための火種が必要なのだ。ネメサイトの信者たちに、自分たちが強く、ドミンの手下が弱ってきていると確信させるものが。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is our chance. We need to act." {n}This is it. I can sense that the prey is close. They have little fear of giving themselves away anymore. They need a spark to ignite the flames. Something that will convince Nemesite's followers that they are strong, and that the Domin's servants are diminished.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「これはチャンスだ。行動に移すぞ」{n}これだ。獲物が近くにいるのを感じる。彼らは自分たちの正体がばれることを、もはや恐れていない。火をつけるための火種が必要なのだ。ネメサイトの信者たちに、自分たちが強く、エニムの手下が弱ってきていると確信させるものが。{/n}

languages.text: “这就是我们的机会，我们得采取行动。”{n}要的就是这句话。我已经感觉到猎物就在附近，他们已经不再惧怕暴露身份。他们只需要一点点火花，就可以将火焰点燃。我要让涅墨斯特的追随者以为他们无比强大，以为秘者的仆人不堪一击。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is our chance. We need to act." {n}This is it. I can sense that the prey is close. They have little fear of giving themselves away anymore. They need a spark to ignite the flames. Something that will convince Nemesite's followers that they are strong, and that the Domin's servants are diminished.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这就是我们的机会，我们得采取行动。”{n}要的就是这句话。我已经感觉到猎物就在附近，他们已经不再惧怕暴露身份。他们只需要一点点火花，就可以将火焰点燃。我要让涅墨斯特的追随者以为他们无比强大，以为秘者的仆人不堪一击。{/n}

languages.text: « C'est le moment ou jamais d'agir. » {n}Ça y est. Je sens que ma proie est proche. Elle ne semble plus craindre de se dévoiler au grand jour. Elle attend simplement l'étincelle qui permettra le feu aux poudres. Quelque chose qui montrera toute l'étendue de sa puissance aux des disciples de Némésite et qui leur fera croire que les serviteurs {rt_mf|du|de la} Domin sont fortement diminués.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is our chance. We need to act." {n}This is it. I can sense that the prey is close. They have little fear of giving themselves away anymore. They need a spark to ignite the flames. Something that will convince Nemesite's followers that they are strong, and that the Domin's servants are diminished.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'est le moment ou jamais d'agir. » {n}Ça y est. Je sens que ma proie est proche. Elle ne semble plus craindre de se dévoiler au grand jour. Elle attend simplement l'étincelle qui permettra le feu aux poudres. Quelque chose qui montrera toute l'étendue de sa puissance aux des disciples de Némésite et qui leur fera croire que les serviteurs {mf|du|de la} Domin sont fortement diminués.{/n}

languages.text: "Fırsat bu fırsattır. Harekete geçmeliyiz." {n}İşte bu. Avın yakında olduğunu hissedebiliyorum. Kendilerini ele vermeye dair pek bir korkuları kalmamış. Alevleri tutuşturacak bir kıvılcıma ihtiyaçları var. Nemezit'in takipçilerini güçlü olduklarına ve Domin'in hizmetkârlarının sayılarının azaldığına ikna edecek bir şeye ihtiyaçları var.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is our chance. We need to act." {n}This is it. I can sense that the prey is close. They have little fear of giving themselves away anymore. They need a spark to ignite the flames. Something that will convince Nemesite's followers that they are strong, and that the Domin's servants are diminished.{/n}
